statements.query: MATCH (n:AzureCosmosDBSqlDatabase)<-[:CONTAINS]-(:AzureDatabaseAccount)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)

MATCH (:AzureCosmosDBSqlDatabase)<-[r:CONTAINS]-(:AzureDatabaseAccount)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)

MATCH (n:AzureCosmosDBSqlContainer)<-[:CONTAINS]-(:AzureCosmosDBSqlDatabase)<-[:CONTAINS]-(:AzureDatabaseAccount)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)

MATCH (:AzureCosmosDBSqlContainer)<-[r:CONTAINS]-(:AzureCosmosDBSqlDatabase)<-[:CONTAINS]-(:AzureDatabaseAccount)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
